name: ShockMarine
description:
Put the game in fullscreen for a better experience

Your multi-function submarine must enter the depths of the oceans to discover the abandoned ruins...

 But invisible aliens will come to attack you!

Take your scanner to spot and destroy them!

 Collect all the keys to open the door of each level

This game was made for the triple trijam 2022 => Development time: 10 h

Dev : Transarc

Art : Tibaud, Epercatap

Sound : Epercatap
